name: Speckle Model Checker Development
postCreateCommand: pip install --user black pylint pytest && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin' >> ~/.zshrc && bash -c 'if [ -f "$HOME/.config/gcloud/configurations/config_devcontainer" ] || [ -f "../.gcloud-config" ]; then echo "Using existing gcloud config"; [ -f "../.gcloud-config" ] && cp -r ../.gcloud-config/* $HOME/.config/gcloud/ 2>/dev/null; else gcloud auth login --no-launch-browser || true && gcloud config configurations create devcontainer 2>/dev/null || true && gcloud init --skip-diagnostics --console-only || true && mkdir -p ../.gcloud-config/ && cp -r $HOME/.config/gcloud/* ../.gcloud-config/ 2>/dev/null && echo "Created local .gcloud-config - add to .gitignore"; fi'
